articles.description: The Wagner chief has been confirmed dead after the genetic analysis of bodies found in Wednesday's plane crash.
articles.title: Prigozhin confirmed dead after genetic tests - Moscow

articles.description: Andrii Pilshchykov won fame taking part in dogfights over Kyiv during the early phase of Russia's invasion.
articles.title: Ukraine war: Fighter ace and two other pilots killed in mid-air crash

articles.description: A man opened fire and barricaded himself in a store before being shot dead by police, reports say.
articles.title: Jacksonville shooting: Several dead at Dollar General store in Florida

articles.description: Fires in western Canada have burned homes and ripped up trees, laying them down "like toothpicks".
articles.title: The indiscriminate devastation of Canada's raging wildfires

articles.description: Merchandise bearing the ex-president's scowling face at his arrest on Thursday is flying off the shelves.
articles.title: Trump campaign raises $7.1m following historic Georgia mugshot

articles.description: Soaring gang violence in Haiti has left more than 2,400 people dead in 2023 alone.
articles.title: Haiti gang opens fire on protesters in capital, killing seven

articles.description: Casings and coins at a site in central France suggest prisoners were shot by the French Resistance after D-Day.

articles.description: Civil rights activists and Martin Luther King Jr's family spoke at the event in Washington DC.

articles.description: Afghanistan's acting vice and virtue minister says female visitors were not observing hijab rules.

articles.description: An internal investigation is launched at Spain's football federation after its sexual violence protocol is activated.
